timeline.bodyText:
It's likely that this will only be called occasionally, for ~one language code. In which case, it might be better optimize the disk use, at the cost of (occasionally) doing some extra computations.
Storing the code map would be a good choice if you need to do a lot of lookups all the time. But, I don't think that's the case here.
For that reason, the other enums have the for (EnumType value : values())  loops that do matching and return a match if found.
timeline.author: jamesonwilliams
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -145,11 +158,10 @@
      * @return An enum value of matching language code
      */
     public static LanguageType from(String languageCode) {

replies.bodyText: Ah good point. I'll do that.
replies.author: raphkim

timeline.message: Apply suggestion to save disk space
